Attributes.description: Statistical models and their properties, estimation methods, properties of point and interval estimation, likelihood, Bayesian inference. Intended for Honours students.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of MATH 320, STAT 305 and one of MATH 152, MATH 221, MATH 223.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: Neville, Room: Scarfe
